title: MAC Client: Ascension FPS Issue
body: I am just confused as to why I am all of a sudden getting 12-17 fps in Ascension mode when previous patches I have never had an issue on any mode. Summoner's Rift, Twisted Treeline, ARAM all give me 30-98 FPS, yet when Ascension begins and everyone is at the shop area I recieve decent 45 fps right but it is when we begin to teleport onto the battlefield I get this drastic frame drop. It really is pissing me the hell off. I know it's this new patch 7.10 problem and I'm asking you guys at riot to get on with clearing up this MAC issue bug along with others reported.

replies.body: I am also experiencing this issue on my Mac :-( I never used to lag in Ascension, but now I do with significant FPS drops, making it really difficult to play well. Happens to me with the Nexus Siege game mode as well.

There could be some bad game files struggling to render assets during that specific game mode.  To start, downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a repair to fix up any of those files.  Make sure that your frames aren't capped as well through your in-game video settings.  Test it out and let me know if it helps.

Thank you for replying I appreciate it. However, your suggestion did not help at all. I also used the re-install option in the Hextair Repair Tool which did not work. I guess I just won't be able to enjoy Ascension this weekend or the next until there is an overall bug fix to the MAC Client.

Thanks for your update, but there could be a few other factors.  Don't give up!  If you have some time, run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well in case of other applications or settings causing these drops.  It will help rule out some more possibilities and get you squared away, just make sure to use the Mac specific instructions.

Once again I did all you said yet still no improvements. I thank you for your help, but I honestly will just wait for a mac fix. It has nothing to do on my end more so with the MAC Client itself I assure you. I won't be playing Ascension mode as of this patch 7.10.

My mac also has been having FPS issues not only on Ascension but on Siege as well. Literally can't play with 7 to 9 fps. I've tried everything Riot said, but there's no fix. It's not the problem on our end, but the Ascension game mode as a whole I think.

I have Windows 7 and a corresponding 7 FPS in ascension, while I get 20 on SR. FeelsBadMan

Also got corrupt files after I tried to restart my laptop to reduce lag and had to repair. Spaghetti Code ftw

This exact same thing happens to me also. I don't know how to fix it unfortunately. But one thing that you can do is once the game starts, you can leave and rejoin and it will be fixed. Other than that, I'm not sure how you can fix this issue. Riot please take care of this.
